website_summaries.verdict: Interesting design allows this electric leaf blower to deliver impressive levels of power.
pros: Has only a 9-amp motor, but it's design means it can deliver a surprising maximum airflow of 530 cu
Can lock trigger in place, allowing your hand to relax
cons: Runs noisier than other corded blowers
Longevity of this unit is questionable

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: love at first try. i never used a leaf blower in my life. i bought this after reading reviews it was easy to use. It is and very powerful. I have a half acre and when i used this in my back yard my leaves were gone in 30 minutes. when i rake it takes hours. it has saved me a ton of work. i wish it was a little quieter. it is loud and after 20 minutes it's annoying. The weight of it is good but a half pound less would be perfect. For the money i'm very happy and i love the green color.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Yard Tool
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic! I didn't have high hopes for it because it's electric and fairly cheap. I was further preparing for disappointment when I looked in the back and saw the TINY fan blade. I've never been more wrong. This thing works great. I just cleared 6 inches of leaves off of my back deck in about 10 minutes. They were also snowed on 3 days ago, so they weren't exactly dry. Time to go do a bit of the yard... Also, the people saying it comes unplugged easily; you're clearly doing it wrong. See pic. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Pingel

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power, blows those leaves to Timbuktu! The strap doesn't work very well, so I ended up just holding it and it gets heavy/bulky after a while. But since it works so well you don't need to carry it for long. There is a bit of a push in the back (it wants to move forward) so you have to really hold on. I have several large eucalyptus trees planted behind my home (HOA won't cut them down) and there's a constant supply of bark, leaves, branches, seeds and pollen that fall throughout the year. This blower will make the patio livable again, so thanks GreenWorks!
customer_reviews.author: Saluki Mom

customer_reviews.title: Must have.  Purchased for home. Please read my comments.
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Holy Cow. Be careful with this one... quality, rock-moving power. A little noisier than expected, so I won't run it at 5 AM. :) Meanwhile- follow the directions. ALL of them. I bumped up on the power, because I wasn't sure of the smaller one... it would have been fine as it turned out.. But I love it. I have rocks and junk in between... hey, no problem. Great clean up after Monsoon mess last week!! Lightweight with shoulder strap. Major ... electric NOT gas driven. That was a requirement for sure! I say, buy it. But approach carefully. It's great. will use alot. - Interior architect.
customer_reviews.author: R. Allen-Hewlett

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Plenty of power to clear stubborn leaves ...
customer_reviews.text: My first leaf blower. I like it. Plenty of power to clear stubborn leaves out of the roses and into the neighbor's yard. Variable speed is awesome for keeping dust down to negligible or ramping up quickly with the trigger when you need to send a a spider or stink bug flying. Fluorescent green color is hip and reminds me of the avocado green color of my folks' fridge in the 70s. With a little tinkering and some propane, I see the potential to turn it into a flamethrower. "Saipan, Hardpan,no difference. We're gonna burn them out!"
customer_reviews.author: TheAnalyst

customer_reviews.title: wow! my yrd work took half the time!!!!
customer_reviews.text: wow! this is 2amps more than my old 7amp and does my yrd work TWICE as fast! i like that it’s longer which helps blow the small sticks my shorter one missed. the down side is it’s REALLY loud so will need to wear earplugs which is no biggie.. it weighs more but it has a shoulder belt that helps..also the finger trigger has a lock so my finger doesn’t tire out.. all in all this is a great blower and very reasonably priced..
customer_reviews.author: nanamamaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Blows extremely hard and steady
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with how powerful the air stream is and how steady. I've mounted it on the front of my garden tractor and I wore earplugs so I can say how loud it is. A few passes through the church parking lot and the leaves are gone! (Also put a hi-output car alternator, Krieger inverter, and cord reel on my John Deere lawn tractor to power stuff like this for landscaping). It does run a bit slower on the inverter than on the grid, but still blows very hard.
customer_reviews.author: PaulTD

customer_reviews.title: Really powerful machine!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously powerful. Be careful as it can uproot plants, but it does have a variable speed, so there is a learning curve to it. I got this for me as our gas powered one is too heavy, turns out hubby ( after doing a little while Tom Sawyer ploy teehee) prefers it ( and he finished the yard lol)
customer_reviews.author: M L MTop Contributor: Quilting

customer_reviews.title: it works.
customer_reviews.text: It's powerful and works for leaves in the yard. I don't know about other uses like drying a car or cleaning a gutter. Cons: 1. The shoulder strap is too small. It won't let you hang the blower low to the ground. 2. There are 2 metal clips at the exhaust vent that hold the green, plastic cover on. I don't know how to remove them for disassembly. Advice: Wear gloves to protect the skin on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Purchase this one!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. Has major power. I bought as a gift for my mom to blow off her carport and back patio. She has big dog that sheds like crazy. This thing is feels like it could blow the paint off the house lol. Outstanding for the money! Totally recommend. And super easy for her to use and light weight too. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: sandra martin

customer_reviews.title: Very Powerful. Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to makes it easier to blow leaves but it’s very versatile. The trigger allows you to control the speed and the air flow is tremendous on this model. I also used it to blow pollen off of my car. It’s a little heavy but they include a shoulder strap. Also at full blast it’s LOUD. Has that jet turbine type sound. Overall works very well and you can control the speed or have it locked down in full blast. The front assembly comes apart for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Bemis

customer_reviews.title: It blows  and sweeps well
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want cordless so opted for a 120v corded blower. It has plenty of power but the electrical cord does hinder the portability somewhat. My other yard tools (mower, weed-eater, hedge trimmer) are also 120v so this adds to the collection. The limits are the cord and only that. Its clean, extremely easy to maintain (no gas, no batteries to charge). Small yard? works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Whodatguy

customer_reviews.title: Low cost + Low Airflow= Not for commercial use
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It doesn’t need gas and it starts right up. Also, it’s light weight and cheap. Cons: It doesn’t push strong enough air if you’re going to use it for business. Probably would be very frustrating if the leaves were wet and clumped together in a gutter or similar. The box is probably exaggerating the CFMs to get people to buy it:(
customer_reviews.author: Maile Hemm

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Powerful and Well-Designed
customer_reviews.text: Based on the many reviews I bought this blower as a replacement for a very old blower that finally died of old age. This new unit is (by comparison) very light and powerful. I love the constantly variable trigger speed control and lock lever. It does produce a high-pitched whine that REQUIRES Hearing Protection. Sounds like a jet engine is revving up.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Quiet & Very Strong Blower
customer_reviews.text: This blower is very small as blowers go. Lightweight too. Took longer to open the box than it took to set everything up and start blowing. The variable speed control works great, with very little sound until it is going fullblast, and even then the sound really doesn't rise to the level of being called noise. Good deal all around. Only gave 4 stars because don't know yet about durability, but it seems really durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Lots of flow!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I opted for the plug in model - just needed it for the garage and around the outside. I use it to blow out the garage instead of sweeping with a broom which takes too long and not nearly as effective. Great CFM - This thing blew ALL the garage dust out in about 10 minutes and no real problems breathing in dust (even though I had a N95 on) since the air momentum keeps dust pushing out instead of just stirring it up.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: This is unexpectedly powerful. I have a small area with steps that using a broom would have been very difficult, so after seeing this leaf blower for such a good price I jumped on it. It is very powerful, but I would recommend using ear protection as it does get quite loud. It works better than previously used plug in leaf blowers made by Toro (used 3 of them over the years). Definitely would purchase again if current one dies.
customer_reviews.author: Vidue

customer_reviews.title: Solid Value For the Cost
customer_reviews.text: I paid forty bucks for this leaf blower and you'd be hard pressed to find a better value somewhere else. It's simple to operate and blows more than hard enough to clear the driveway and sidewalk area. A clamp to prevent the extension cord from unplugging from the machine would improve it, but that's minor.
customer_reviews.author: Herman J. Allmaras

customer_reviews.title: Changed my rating after one summer of use
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the blower once a week over the Spring and Summer, and now the motor howls so loudly I worry about bothering my neighbors. It still works, but given the noise that has developed, I wonder for how much longer. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jono

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this, obviously the only downside is that you ...
customer_reviews.text: Woah, this little puppy puts out quite a bit of power. I am very impressed with how quickly it ramps up to full throttle and how much power it has, especially for the price point. I highly recommend this, obviously the only downside is that you need to plug it in to a power source instead of being battery powered but that's why the price is a fraction of comparable ones.
customer_reviews.author: HLP

customer_reviews.title: Lots of force, but no way to direct it.
customer_reviews.text: It blows, that's for sure. But the air comes out like an explosion and disperses everything all over the place. There is no attachment that would concentrate or direct the force of the air, so my garage filled with dirt and dust and ended up worse than before I started!
customer_reviews.author: RSK

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This little monster is great. We love it and hope it continue to satisfy our needs for carport and patio👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Fannie Barrington

customer_reviews.title: This deal did not blow me around
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. It is a strong blower for a residential user. It has a high pitched whine in the highest setting, son you need ear muffs. I like the variable setting dependent upon the finger pressure of he trigger. I also like the trigger locking feature in the highest setting. I accidentally dropped it from about two feet onto the cool deck. It did not break. Nice quality for tie money.
customer_reviews.author: Texas KnowHow

customer_reviews.title: died after about a year
customer_reviews.text: For the time that it worked, it worked fine. After a year and a half it just stopped one day. I thought it may be my cord, so i swapped the cord and in a different outlet and it still didn't turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Brett G

customer_reviews.title: Good item for a  house as it has multiple use for it. Does not blow the water off the car
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for drying the car, but ended up using for blowing everything in the house, from back yard to the garage. It does not dry the car as there is not nozzle to direct the flow. Good product for the price. I hope it does not cause not electrical issues in the long run. Just have to wait and see.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sivakumar

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly powerful blower. Plug and play. Use it on my driveway. I live in Florida and you have to blow the sand away every day or track it into your house. Works great. 5 🌟. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: zane

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, powerful blower
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed at a good price. For a lightweight, electric (corded) blower, it has a lot of power. Greenworks is a good brand; I have a Greenworks hedge trimmer that has been a workhorse, and I expect this blower will be among my yard tools for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Cyd Haug-West

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, great to use!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very lightweight yet powerful blower. As a woman, this is perfect for me, love the handle, comfortable to use. Does not come with a cord, so you'd need to order one for it.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Green works blower is the best blower I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I got this blower. Would purchase this product again. This company got this product right. Don’t think there is that you could change to make this better.
customer_reviews.author: jtotman719

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice So Far...
customer_reviews.text: Only tried once so far, need to practice near walls and corners to not have debris blow back behind me (where I had already blown - almost definitely user error though). Overall it's light weight, easy to handle, more than powerful enough (it moved ROCKS, albeit small rocks, but still!) and really love the variable speed control. Like the fact that it comes with a warranty, but it seems well built and I think it's unlikely that we'll need to use the warranty. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Half the weight/3xs the power of my B&D.
customer_reviews.text: Half the weight of my Black & Decker with 3 times the power. VERY pleased. The only suggestion I would make to the manufacturer is to have the intake vent to the bottom because I brace it against my body and it sucks my clothes into it. The included strap is just too awkward to use, so of no use.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa Carrollwood

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Greenworks has done a great job with this product. This blower is great doing work around the yard. Provides plenty of blowing power to moves leaves, dirt, and grass.
customer_reviews.author: ceaser trevino

customer_reviews.title: It's loud, but it REALLY blows like a jet engine!
customer_reviews.text: It's loud, but it REALLY blows!! I never thought I'd be needing hearing protection when using an electric blower, but this thing does sound (as well as blow) like a jet engine! I just hope it lasts since I've been having a handful of other battery powered blowers that died on me - with motor bearings wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: Evan G

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect an electric blower to really have much power, but this thing does! It took a while because I've been lazy, but it blew an entire fall's worth of leaves from my half acre backyard.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: I bought this greenworks one and it worked awesome, better than the Ryobi all day long
customer_reviews.text: I bought a fancy Ryobi with a rechargeable battery for $175 last year and it didn't make it one year. I bought this greenworks one and it worked awesome, better than the Ryobi all day long. If you want a good leaf blower, buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: BIG WARD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and easy to operate. Used as a leaf blower. The power rating is a little over rated but it did the job. Not as powerful as other blowers that I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: tilly

customer_reviews.title: Good lightweight air blower and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Fairly powerfull. I have been using this blower for a long time. Variable speed makes it easy to direct air flow.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great for someone on a fixed income like
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprise the power this blower had for this price. The price was right in my budget. Very light weight ideal for me I am a senior lady.
customer_reviews.author: Luella M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Blower
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the power of this blower. It even blew wet leaves and debris off the driveway after a rainstorm. I also like that you can very the speed of it.
customer_reviews.author: sixpence-guy

customer_reviews.title: This works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This works like a charm. I ordered it to blow off patios and walkways of the show model homes that I clean. It works wonders! You will need an extension cord. I bought a 25 ft cord to ensure I could walk a good distance around the homes. Highly recommend. It's lightweight and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Shay

customer_reviews.title: very annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you wear ear protection when operating this. You need some sort of connector to hold your extension cord onto the plug; very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Barium5

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Man used this for the first time today and it worked great. Super light with plenty of blowing power. Im super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Strong air!
customer_reviews.text: Most of the time I use it to dry my car after washing, and it's doing a great job. If you need it to blow off your driveway or sidewalk or porch, it does well for that too. For the money you can't beat it. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D.

customer_reviews.title: powerful and variable speed
customer_reviews.text: This blower is super nice. Has plenty of power for clearing dust and debris from my horse barn aisle. Variable speed is easy to use and responsive, making this useful in a variety of contexts. Lightweight, too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Toenjes

customer_reviews.title: Hearing protection is needed
customer_reviews.text: Overall good performance. Very loud tho. Hearing protection is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is too short!
customer_reviews.text: This product should work just fine if you've got a higher powered battery, which costs more than the blower itself. My husband used the blower once and it lasted less than 10 minutes. Much too short of a time for the project.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help keep the garage clean. I have a backpack blower but it's not convenient to use for quick garage clean ups. This handheld blower is powerful but wear hearing protection. It's painfully loud.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Too bad its useless
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after the 3rd use. Still looks brand new. Too bad its useless.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I had a drainage problem which required a swale to carry water away from a bedroom. I used a rototiller to loosen and pulverize the soil and this blower to blow the soil away. I'm sure it will handle all the leaves within my 100' power line.It's no louder than a gas driven unit.
customer_reviews.author: jgdittier

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this blower. Has cut down on a lot of time and sweeping for him.
customer_reviews.author: Cillie

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice speed but it won't build up pressure. I used my old one to 'blow out' my exhaust pipes on my pellet stove but if I try and do the same with this one it spins fast and won't work. Very nice for sweeping the floor though.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. Altman

customer_reviews.title: Good blower but a little hard to control
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and only give this a four as I find the cord much more inconvenient than on my corded mower. I also have a bit of difficulty controlling the strength of the blower but that may not be the blower’s fault. Overall I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Corrected low rating: two star to 4 1/2
customer_reviews.text: Blower cut out because of cord to machine connection (arcing noises). Tried two different cords I use with other power tools without resolving the problem. Hence the poor satisfaction. Today I used a brand new extension cord and it works great! Spared my sending it back!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice blower
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, lightweight, reliable so far. Cones could lock in a little better.
customer_reviews.author: James D Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoulder straps to help free your hand help keep weight off. It blows really good. Lots of power. It's a litte heavy but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a powerhouse! I use this to clean up around a magnolia tree. Very powerful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Blower!
customer_reviews.text: Very good and powerful blower. Used it serval times now . No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.1970’s

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quieter blower
customer_reviews.text: It is powerful enough for what we need and works far better than a battery one.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Franz

customer_reviews.title: The ratio of Loud to Strong is very strongly leaning ...
customer_reviews.text: The ratio of Loud to Strong is very strongly leaning towards loud. Full blast is almost deafening but doesn't actually blow as much as one would think
customer_reviews.author: Friend

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this has a LOT of fricken power ! was not expecting that at all ! A+++
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent value. It performs well and is inexpensive compared to competing products with similar performance characteristics.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo Emerson

customer_reviews.title: ... several times since he received it and it works fine. No problems with it at all
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used this leaf blower several times since he received it and it works fine. No problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Herdman

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this 30 years ago!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this item... don’t need to ask my husband to clean back patio... very light, cleans my entire patio 30 X 30 feet in 15 seconds max... problem solved, now patio is always clean... would def recommend... my #1 purchase of this year!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for close quarters around the house, corded. Patio and garage!
customer_reviews.author: jason crowley

customer_reviews.title: Light to carry, works well
customer_reviews.text: Very light, easy to use for 10 year olds and adult women. Excellent for those that aspire to have your kids do outside chores.
customer_reviews.author: Riverside

customer_reviews.title: Great value, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Fairly lightweight and very powerful. Exactly what I wanted for leaf blowing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Use this blower several times a week. Even after months of use....still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Threw broom away
customer_reviews.text: So powerful, the high CFM will grab an untucked shirt quickly during operation.
customer_reviews.author: Moonpossum

customer_reviews.title: and this is perfect for keeping the grass clippings blown off
customer_reviews.text: This is a very strong blower. I have a small yard with a driveway and sidewalk, and this is perfect for keeping the grass clippings blown off.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sugg

customer_reviews.title: Work perfect, the throttle level is quite helpful
customer_reviews.text: Work perfect, the throttle level is quite helpful. Light enough to carry and move around. Has more than enough power to clean up and push debri around. Definately recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good powerful one but I mainly use it for cleaning ...
customer_reviews.text: It's good powerful one but I mainly use it for cleaning old PCs and equipment! It does a good job removing dust and I ll like that u increase the power by just pressing more
customer_reviews.author: CruiseHappily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does all the work more expensive models do, for less $$
customer_reviews.author: Cypress House

customer_reviews.title: Super powerful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me as it's lightweight runs on electricity and is super powerful go for the 9 Ampmodel it's worth it! Makes short work of leaves and debris in my yard.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Not as much or the power but does the job
customer_reviews.author: AHA

customer_reviews.title: Works well and great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is my first leaf blower, I like it a lot I've used it several times. Works exactly the way it's supposed to
customer_reviews.author: shawn m. fischl

customer_reviews.title: good for small yards just what i
customer_reviews.text: Worked Flawlessly out of the box, good for small yards just what i needed
customer_reviews.author: Jose Padin

customer_reviews.title: Great blower
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this little powerful blower! Such a great buy and works fabulously!
customer_reviews.author: KSW

customer_reviews.title: loud
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it does the job well, but it's loud and I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. A little loud...but then again, it is a leaf blower. Very light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: GroovinDE

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but loud..
customer_reviews.text: Great little blower for the price. More powerful than my old Tore. Only setback is that it is really loud and high pitched. Wearing ear protection is a must.
customer_reviews.author: todped

customer_reviews.title: Product is really good.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t receive delivery so bought from different store. Product is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little blower for the job it was intended, lightweight clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Kodi2k6

customer_reviews.title: very nice blower
customer_reviews.text: very nice and light weight , strong blowing power .
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: Internal motor shooting sparks after first use.
customer_reviews.text: Started shooting out sparks when I turned it on after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Deli

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was "blown away" ( pun intended!) with the power of this leaf blower!!! 100X better than my previous blower!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd Greenworks purchase and I am very pleased. This really gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd Greenworks purchase and I am very pleased. This really gets the job done. I don't mind it's corded, as is my mower and they both work fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent power. Can clear almost the entire gutter when ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent power. Can clear almost the entire gutter when held at one end. Super value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Clement Ebler

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stop working but it was too cold to troubleshoot so will try again on a warmer day
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl F. Fennell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it stopped working in 4 minutes. We had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Good leaf blower for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Had it for about a month. Good blower for the money
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This item worked once for 10 minutes and then just quit and won't restart. It is a piece of crap. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: James G Meyd

customer_reviews.title: 9A model: Good power, just a bit too noisy.
customer_reviews.text: I got the 9am model. Never had a leaf blower before, but I'm pretty happy with the power and air flow rate. Not sure if it is truly 130mph or 530cfm as they claim, but it does moves leaves, and small debris, even small pebbles. The downside I feel is how loud it is a full power, it is above the comfort zone for the ear in some positions when you are using it and could damage hearing over prolong use without protection. Trigger is nice, as you can control the speed by how deep you depress.
customer_reviews.author: Chiko L.

customer_reviews.title: Lost a star b/c the cord gets in the way ...
customer_reviews.text: Lost a star b/c the cord gets in the way and even when properly screwed on, the plastic tip piece falls off when blowing.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Great Leaf blower for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little leaf blower! Has lots of power, I was so surprised and very happy! The price is right!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Just what you are looking for
customer_reviews.text: 1 min to assemble, easy to use, light weight, used to blow sidewalk and driveway grass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for light snow too
customer_reviews.text: Works great for light snow too! Did a much better job than the shovel at removing snow from the texture in my driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Great patio cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I can't believe I was thinking of using a broom to get rid of debris and pine needles on my large patio. This does it perfectly and it's so cheap!
customer_reviews.author: T. Stearns

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I recently used it for cleaning a garage floor and deck. It is very, very loud but it gets the job done. Attaches to a regular extension cord . Have fun
customer_reviews.author: Sky Potter

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  High end is deafening.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Has variable speed trigger. High end is truly deafening so I wear ear protectors when using full blast.
customer_reviews.author: bf

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Powerful - Best value for money!!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and super powerful leaf blower that paid for itself in the very first use. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: BeeCee

product_meta.title: Greenworks 9 Amp Jet Electric Leaf Blower, BA09B00
product_meta.description: Make easy work of cleaning debris from driveways, sidewalks, porch, and patio with this Greenworks 9A Electric Leaf Blower. It has a zero carbon footprint and releases no emissions. Plus, it features a cord lock that helps prevent the cord from disconnecting from its outlet during operation, and it is designed with dual handles to make it easy to maneuver into smaller areas that need a cleanup.
feature_bullets: 9 Amp motor provides powerful blowing performance
Powerful axial design provides 530 CFM at 130 MPH
Reduce fatigue with cruise control and variable speed trigger. Light weight construction at 5.6 lbs.
Safety cord lock prevents cord from disconnecting (cord not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars245 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
